bug.author: wrzzd
bug.summary: DocError: some details of document needs be updated.
bug.description:
Short summary about the issue/question: some details of document needs be updated. Brief what process you are following: How to reproduce it: nni Environment:
nni version: nni mode(local|pai|remote): OS: python version: is conda or virtualenv used?: is running in docker?:
: yes : Some details of document, at '<denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/nni/blob/master/docs/en_US/Compressor/Quantizer.md>https://github.com/microsoft/nni/blob/master/docs/en_US/Compressor/Quantizer.md</denchmark-link> ', maybe old which needs be updated: like: nni.compressors.torch.NaiveQuantizer(model).compress() should be updated by: nni.compression.torch.NaiveQuantizer(model).compress() thx.

comments.comment: Adding <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Cjkkkk>@Cjkkkk</denchmark-link> to validate and update accordingly
Thank you for bringing up this issue. The doc has been updated accordingly in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/nni/pull/1881>#1881</denchmark-link>
